text: They have so many nice roses!! The boss is also very helpful, he doesn’t just want you to buy and make sales but he will ensure you are prepared. He even provide information and guideline.

This is my first visit and I am sure I will keep coming. The environment is clean and breezy, plants are kept neatly in good health and amazingly reasonable price! Spotted many rare plants, so happy to be able to take pictures. I’m guessing the mister who showed me the plants is the owner, he’s knowledgeable, very kind and humble. Absolutely pleased with my experience here, cannot wait to visit again! Thank you so much!!!

The google map clearly indicated that they were open but now the owner blamed people for not checking their website before going there. Their staff delivering plants to a supermarket even told us their address and that they were closed on weekends. What’s wrong with the owner? Besides, there were no sign whatsoever at their entrance telling people not to enter or they won’t be served. All they did was to get a fierce looking guy staring at us for a minute without saying anything. When we wanted to buy something, we were just completely ignored. All these clearly indicates their mismanagement and hostility towards customers.

The staff (i didn't get her name) was very helpful & friendly. She gave me advice on rose care. The boss was equally friendly too & so were his 3 dogs :). Will go back again to purchase the Kampong Rose :) Also I like the fact that the lady staff knows the names of the roses & all the roses were labelled with their names. So it goes to show this nursery knows their roses :)

A disappointed trip! Didn’t feel welcome at all because no one bothered to attend to us. A staff stopped by but was so unfriendly that he walked away without fully answer our questions. Definitely won’t go back again.
